---

Data types are as follows:

1) Numeric
```{r}
a=20
class(a)
```
2)Character
```{r}
b="Hello"
class(b)
```
3) Logical
```{r}
c=TRUE
class(c)
d=FALSE
class(d)
```
4) Date
```{r}
date1=as.Date("2015-04-16")
class(date1)
```
5)POSIXct - Date & Time
```{r}
date2=as.POSIXct("2015-5-18 16:32")
class(date2)
```
